scenes.background: Monica looks frustrated while Bob listens intently to your guidance over the video call.
scenes.description: 'Thanks for your help, but this is really your responsibility. How do you plan to manage it?'

options.text: Let's focus on solving the problem first. We can discuss responsibilities later.
options.analysis: You prioritized resolving the issue, showing good perception and empathy, though your self-regulation could be stronger.

options.text: I understand your frustration, but I'm on leave. Can we find a middle ground?
options.analysis: You acknowledged the frustration and sought a compromise, showing good self-regulation but lower motivation and empathy.

options.text: I believe this can be handled without my constant involvement. You've got this!
options.analysis: You encouraged self-sufficiency, showing strong self-regulation but lower empathy, perception, and motivation to help.
